title: Nossa Senhora da Candelária (Capela de)
body: With this invocation, and in the place that bears this name, there is a chapel in the parish of Tábua, with its ancient construction attributed to one of the early settlers surnamed Medeiros, having been rebuilt in a year that we are unaware of. It was the center of an ancient pilgrimage.

Tábua: Location of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Candelária
